Verses: 1 karththarai Thudhiththu, Avarudaiya Naamaththai Pirasthaabamaakkungal, Avarudaiya Seygaigalai Janangalukkulle Pirasiththappaduththungal.
2 avarai Paadi, Avarai Keerththanampannungal; Avarudaiya Adhisayangalaiyellaam Dhiyaaniththu Pesungal.
3 avarudaiya Parisuththa Naamaththai Kuriththu Menmaipaaraattungal; Karththarai Thedugiravargalin Irudhayam Magizhvadhaaga.
4 karththaraiyum Avar Vallamaiyaiyum Naadungal; Avar Samugaththai Niththamum Thedungal.
5 avarudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiye! Avaraal Therindhukollappattavargalaagiya Yaakkobin Puththirare!
6 avar Seydha Adhisayangalaiyum, Avarudaiya Arpudhangalaiyum, Avar Vaakkin Niyaayaththeerppugalaiyum Ninaivukoorungal.
7 avare Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar, Avarudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugal Boomiyengum Vilangum.
8 aayiranthalaimuraikkendru Avar Kattalaiyitta Vaakkaiyum, Aabiragaamode Avar Pannina Udanpadikkaiyaiyum,
9 avar Eesaakkukku Itta Aanaiyaiyum Endrendraikkum Ninaiththirukkiraar.
10 adhai Yaakkobukku Piramaanamaagavum, Isravelukku Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaagavum Urudhippaduththi:
11 ungal Sudhandharapaagamaana Kaanaan Dhesaththai Unakku Tharuven Endraar.
12 akkaalaththil Avargal Konja Thogaikkutpatta Sorpa Janangalum Paradhesigalumaayirundhaargal.
13 avargal Oru Janaththaivittu Maru Janaththandaikkum, Oru Raajyaththaivittu Maru Dhesaththaarandaikkum Ponaargal.
14 avargalai Odukkumpadi Oruvarukkum Idankodaamal, Avargalnimiththam Raajaakkalai Kadindhu Kondu:
15 naan Abishegampanninavargalai Neengal Thodaamalum, Ennudaiya Theerkkadharisigalukku Theengu Seyyaamalum Irungal Endraar.
16 avar Dhesaththile Panjaththai Varuviththu, Aagaaramennum Aadharavu Kolai Mutrilum Muriththaar.
17 avargalukku Munnaale Oru Purushanai Anuppinaar; Yoseppu Siraiyaaga Virkappattaan.
18 avan Kaalgalai Vilangupottu Odukkinaargal; Avan Piraanan Irumbil Adaipattirundhadhu.
19 karththar Sonna Vaarththai Niraiverumalavum Avarudaiya Vasanam Avanai Pudamittadhu.
20 raajaa Aal Anuppi, Avanai Kattavizhkkasonnaan; Janangalin Adhibadhi Avanai Vidudhalaipanninaan.
21 than Pirabukkalai Avan Manadhinpadi Kattavum, Than Mooppargalai Gnaanigalaakkavum,
22 avanai Than Veettukku Aandavanum, Than Aasdhikkellaam Adhibadhiyumaakkinaan.
23 appozhudhu Isravel Egipdhirku Vandhaan; Yaakkobu Kaamin Dhesaththile Paradhesiyaayirundhaan.
24 avar Thammudaiya Janangalai Migavum Palugappanni, Avargaludaiya Saththurukkalaippaarkkilum Avargalai Balavaangalaakkinaar.
25 thammudaiya Janangalai Pagaikkavum, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararai Vanjanaiyaai Nadaththavum, Avargaludaiya Irudhayaththai Maatrinaar.
26 thammudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Moseyaiyum Thaam Therindhukonda Aaronaiyum Anuppinaar.
27 ivargal Avargalukkul Avarudaiya Adaiyaalangalaiyum, Kaamin Dhesaththile Arpudhangalaiyum Seydhaargal.
28 avar Irulai Anuppi, Andhagaaraththai Undaakkinaar; Avarudaiya Vaarththaigalai Edhirppaarillai.
29 avargaludaiya Thanneergalai Raththamaaga Maatri, Avargaludaiya Machchangalai Saagappanninaar.
30 avargaludaiya Dhesam Thavalaigalai Thiralaai Pirappiththadhu; Avargaludaiya Raajaakkalin Araiveedugalilum Avaigal Vandhadhu.
31 avar Kattalaiyida, Avargaludaiya Ellaigalilengum Vandugalum Pengalum Vandhadhu.
32 avargaludaiya Mazhaigalai Kalmazhaiyaakki, Avargaludaiya Dhesaththile Juvaalikkira Akkiniyai Varappanninaar.
33 avargaludaiya Thiraatsach Chedigalaiyum Aththimarangalaiyum Azhiththu, Avargaludaiya Ellaigalilulla Marangalaiyum Muriththaar.
34 avar Kattalaiyida, Ennimudiyaadha Vettukkiligalum Pachchaippuzhukkalum Vandhu,
35 avargaludaiya Dhesaththilulla Sagala Poondugalaiyum Ariththu, Avargaludaiya Nilaththin Kaniyai Thindrupottadhu.
36 avargaludaiya Dhesaththile Thalaichchangal Anaiththaiyum, Avargaludaiya Belanil Mudharbelanaana Yaavaraiyum Sangariththaar.
37 appozhudhu Avargalai Velliyodum Ponnodum Purappadappanninaar; Avargal Koththirangalil Balaveenappattavan Oruvanum Irundhadhillai.
38 egipthiyar Avargalukku Bayandhadhinaal, Avargal Purappattapodhu Magizhndhaargal.
39 avar Megaththai Maraivukkaaga Viriththu, Iravai Velichchamaakkugiradharkaaga Akkiniyaiyum Thandhaar.
40 kettaargal, Avar Kaadaigalai Varappanninaar; Vaana Appaththinaalum Avargalaith Thirupthiyaakkinaar.
41 kanmalaiyai Thirandhaar, Thanneergal Purappattu, Varanda Veligalil Aaraai Oditru.
42 avar Thammudaiya Parisuththa Vaakkuththaththaththaiyum, Thammudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Aabiragaamaiyum Ninaiththu,
43 thammudaiya Janaththai Kalippodum, Thaam Therindhukondavargalai Gembeera Saththaththodum Purappadappanni,
44 thamadhu Kattalaigalai Kaaththu Nadakkumpadikkum, Thamadhu Niyaayappiramaanangalai Kaikkollumpadikkum,
45 avargalukku Purajaadhigaludaiya Dhesangalai Koduththaar; Anniya Janangaludaiya Pirayaasaththinbalanai Sudhandhariththukkondaargal. Allelooyaa.
